title: daathrul,the theif
body:
daathrul
the theif [noxian]

passive. Pick pocket. upon taking  damage from an enemy champion will steal 10% of champions current gold [20 second cool down]

sleight of hand. when in range[700 range] deals damage[80/110/140/170/210+ad scale] steals a random champions item[not really] negates the effects of 1 randomly picked enemy item for 3/3.5/4/4.5/5 secs


getawAY- daathrel throws a smoke bomb and dash's to curser,becoming untargetable for 1 second... [800 range]

black jack-daathrul throws a baton at target[800 range] deALING DAMAGE[90/125/150/200/250+ad scale].if the target is facing him he is slowed for[25/30/35/40/45%]for 2 secs.if the target has back turned he is stunned for 1.5 secs.


Dazed and confused. daathrul confuses enemy champion for 5/7/10 secs rendering their abilities to be cast randomly. ie press q activate r, press q activate w and so forth.[1000 range]

Havnt been able to play due to fps problems, so i came with a champ idea. enjoy, just a rough idea,but i can see how many jimmies would by russled by this champ.

replies.body: My jimmies are also rustled, report for being a Jimmy rustler
im not putting anything down but you wouldnt want it to be to high.
